phrases: If I were to die now, I doubt Ren would die with me anymore.
But that is fine.
That is how it should be.
I must be crazy for thinking that is sad.

Chasing after your shadow
And it is over, it is like sand now
I sigh every night
I scream like a child and cried
It hangs there quietly, my sorrow
Please, please God, forgive my sins
I do not need to hide no more
Flowing toward the turquoise light
Just keep going on
You have got the chance now
You have got the power
Know you got to be so true to yourself
I show you my life now
I show you my love now
I show you my everything yeah yeah

I will show you my love now

Excuse me, I am from next door, and...
I think she is hyperventilating.
D-Do you have a plastic or paper bag?
You do not have one?
A paper bag would be better.
If you do not use it right, plastic could make it worse.
Really?
Or rather, how should she use it?
Well... um...
I have never been in this situation before...
You seem like you know a lot.
Is it safe for someone not in the medical profession to do it?
Sure.
I always do it by myself.
Lay her on her back,
then cover her nose and mouth with the paper bag,
but make a little opening.
Like this...
Have her take deep breaths, and it will stop before long.
It is a living hell.
Th-Thank you.
I will give it a shot.
You do not have to freak out.
She is got that guy, who is like a tranquilizer.
Tranquilizer?
I was jealous so I said something mean.
Sorry.
As if being pulled up from the depths of the ocean,
I was finally able to breathe.
Yasu's chest had the sweet scent of Black Stone.
I am not going anywhere.
- Ah, Ginpei.
Keep up the good work.
- Where is Nana?!
How is she?!
Did you notify Dr. Azuma?!
Calm down.
She was probably just hyperventilating.
The same symptoms as Myu's.
That is a problem.
The security guard apparently phoned the agency
instead of getting an ambulance.
Ginpei rushed over
and he drove me to see a doctor he said he knew well.
By the time we arrived at the hospital,
which was past its hours of operation,
I was feeling completely back to normal.
AZUMA CLINIC I was feeling completely back to normal.
AZUMA CLINIC
AZUMA CLINIC
But they insisted that I get checked just to be sure,
AZUMA CLINIC and I got a thorough physical checkup.
AZUMA CLINIC
Hyperventilation syndrome.
Also known simply as hyperventilation.
What is that?
It is just as the words suggest.
It is caused by excessive breathing.
The carbon dioxide levels in your blood decrease,
causing the attack.
Carbon dioxide levels in my blood?
Be quiet and listen.
Your attack subsided
when you placed a paper bag over your mouth
and breathed into it.
This is called the paper bag technique, and...
Doctor, I do not need you to share your knowledge with me.
What the hell's wrong with me?
Is it my lungs?
No.
Then is it my blood?
No.
Then it must be'because I smoke even though I am on the pill.
But I heard that when you are young, a little is all right.
A little?
That is not good.
You risk getting thrombosis, you know.
I know that, but I cannot quit either.
What am I going to do?
If you would use protection instead, then the problem's solved.
Huh?
Me?
Come on, Doctor!
You are misunderstanding!
Yasu belongs to me!
My apologies.
But in any case,
the examination shows there is nothing wrong with you,
so you can relax.
Huh?!
I was in so much pain I thought I would die!
Did you examine me properly?!
You rogue doctor!
Nana...
Miss Osaki, calm down.
Hyperventilation can occur after strenuous exercise,
but it can also easily happen if you are overly nervous or excited.
But she is always like this, Doctor.
How can it be cured?
Well, there is no guarantee it will even happen again.
The best thing to do is not worry about it.
Of course I will be worried!
I am a singer, Doctor!
Performing live is a tough workout,
and I do get really excited when performing.
I cannot risk having another attack onstage!
Please do something!
Hmm...
But this is stress-related, which is not my area of expertise.
If you are worried, I suggest you see a psychiatrist.
If you would like, I will write you a referral.
- A psychiatrist? - Thank you very much, Doctor!
I always appreciate your help greatly!
Nana!
Oh, you were here?
Oh, you look perfectly fine.
Nana!
Are you feeling all right?
What did the doctor say?
He says I am nuts, like I thought.
BAM
That hurt!
Wow, that stone head full of prejudices will not even crack!
THAT REALLY HURT...
Wow, that stone head full of prejudices will not even crack!
Wow, that stone head full of prejudices will not even crack!
Do not crack it!
In this modern age,
everyone has to deal with varying degrees of stress.
It is truly a difficult world to live in.
You just happen to be a little more sensitive than others.
There is nothing wrong with that.
But I hate myself for being so weak.
I cannot stand being who I am anymore...
So why do these guys continue being with me?
They have guts.
NOBU MESSAGE FROM NANA
I AM REALLY BUSY SO I CANNOT CALL YOU, BUT I AM DOING REALLY WELL, DARLING!
LET US BOTH DO OUR BEST.
Why is there so much work to do immediately after returning?!
It cannot be helped.
Going to England was not part of the original schedule.
So stop whining!
Sorry about that.
It is not your fault, Ren.
I do not think it was necessary
to go all the way to England in the first place.
What are you doing?!
Do not touch it with your filthy hands!
Filthy?
I am outta lighter fluid.
That is a lighter, right?
Huh?
So that is a lighter?
Wow, it is huge!
You know, you said the same thing
when you saw the one Shin was using at the after-party.
Have you forgotten already?
Huh?
You mean Shin from BLAST?
He said it was a limited edition.
It is a rare item.
Is that right?
That one you have is not Shin's, is it?
It is not!
Why are you carrying a lighter in the first place
when you do not even smoke?
It is a present from a fan, and I like it!
Must be nice to get cool stuff like that.
All I get are stuffed animals.
My room's full of stuffed animals.
You are actually displaying them?
Ren, hand me your lighter.
I HAVE BEEN THROWN INTO THIS JAIL THEY CALL A DORM.
I AM THINKING OF A WAY THAT I CAN MEET YOU WITHOUT ANYONE NOTICING, BUT HAVE NOT COME UP WITH ANY IDEAS.
I WOULD LOVE TO SEE YOU SOON.
Saying I was busy was just an excuse.
I am sure Ren realized that.
But if I heard Ren's voice,
I thought I would have trouble breathing again.
I was scared.
So now, I am announcing today's schedule!
There is a photo shoot for promo material at the Harajuku studio.
Detergent?
DETERGENT?
Detergent?
DETERGENT?
Promo material.
DETERGENT?
In the afternoon,
there will be three interviews for music magazines.
We are introducing ourselves so we will be visiting them.
Please make sure you are very polite to the people
during these work-related visits.
We want to leave a good impression.
Remember, your rebellious image is only an act.
Also, if they ask you any questions about your private life,
do not answer.
Then, at seven, we will meet with event organizers
to discuss the guerrilla live performance.
That will be at the Gaia main office.
A rehearsal at the Kagurazaka studios at nine.
Finishing time depends on Matsuo's mood.
Well, there you have it.
It is not as packed as I thought.
THERE IS ROOM FOR MORE.
Well, there you have it.
It is not as packed as I thought.
Well, there you have it.
It is not as packed as I thought.
That is plenty packed!
Nana's still recovering, you know!
Not a problem at all.
Well then, we are leaving now!
We will have breakfast in the car.
All right!
I am starving!
The busier I was, the better I felt.
This is Masaru, the stylist.
Nice to meet you.
- Nice to meet you, too.
If the work was fulfilling,
I felt refreshed, so I did not think I had to go to the hospital.
I do not intend to change much.
Your styles are already pretty well established.
I agree!
Let us bring bondage back into style!
SIGH
SIGH
There were so many people involved with BLAST's debut project
There were so many people involved with BLAST's debut project
that I could not remember everyone is name.
I cannot ask about your private life?
At least tell me what your hobbies are.
- Mahjongg. - That was fast!
Interacting with people was never my forte,
but I had no problem with it.
Teacher, I am so hungry I cannot reach the high notes!
Do not blame it on your stomach.
One more time!
Yo, Old Fox!
How are ya doing?
What dirty tricks do you have up your sleeve this time?
Nana!
Looking good.
Okay, do not move.
Think we should tell Misato about the live performance?
But it is on a weekday.
Midterms are coming up, right?
If we tell her, it could be a disaster for her.
I wonder if she will be able to graduate.
Hey guys!
You cannot tell anyone about it!
I felt that if I saw Hachi now, I could laugh and talk with her.
I felt I could even listen to her talk about Takumi and the baby.
But, there just was not any time.
I am sleepy.
But if I do not do the laundry today,
I will run outta clothes to wear.
I have got to hurry and move my stuff from the old apartment
and cancel the lease.
It is a waste of money.
Will not anyone do it for me?
The laundry too?
But everything will not fit here.
Should I just send it to my parents' place for now?
But I will bet my Dad's still angry with me.
But when BLAST's debut is officially confirmed,
I will bet they will be so thrilled.
G-Good evening.
LAUNDRY
Um...
Can I ask you something?
Huh?
Ah, well, about hyperventilation.
You probably would not want to talk about it, huh?
I am sorry.
It is all right.
What is it?
One of our staff members told me,
that if Nana has another attack,
we should stay calm and act as if it is no big deal.
That if the people around her start to panic,
it would only make her more anxious.
I do think he has a point and I hear that is what the doctor's said,
so that may be the right thing to do.
But would not you feel lonely if you were in great pain
and those around you acted like it is no big deal?
Like, I wonder if I could remain calm.
I doubt if I could.
LAUGH
Huh?
Whether you are surrounded by people who are calm or upset,
you would not be lonely if you could feel their compassion.
I do not know about other people, but that is how I would feel.
I feel like I just asked something really obvious as a person.
Hey, is that a script for a movie?
Yeah.
You are an actress?!
More or less.
I am sorry.
I did not know.
It is okay.
I am not at all well-known.
This is a small part for a straight-to-video.
What is the title?!
I will be sure to watch it when it goes on sale!
TANKI NA ONNA
TANKI NA ONNA Tanki na Onna.
Tanki na Onna.
A mahjongg movie?!
I love mahjongg!
Though I am really bad!
Um, can I ask you one more thing?
What?
What is your name?
I wonder how many people in this city know my name right now.
Hey, what is that?
Is someone coming?
Who knows?
It is probably some unknown singer.
It would be nice if they could get Trapnest to perform.
I can never get a ticket.
That will never happen.
Anyway, Yuji and the guys are at the karaoke and told us to join.
Want To go?
- Sure.
Will they be paying?
- Mr. Kawano?
We are all set here.
Okay, go!
Play as hard as you want!
Hi, Yuji?
Yeah.
We are on our way now.
- Nana! - Huh?!
Hey, that is BLAST!
BLAST!
No way.
- No way!
Nana?! - What?
Who?
- She is the worst!
Get lost! - Do not you know them?
I cannot tell which ones are the hired applauders.
Looks like we are more famous than I thought.
I guess Ren's pretty popular with the peop-.
That means we do not hafta spend time on introductions.
I appreciate it, paparazzi.
October 10, 2001.
Seven p.m. in Shinjuku.
You guys all better be thankful
for the fate of just happening to be here right now by coincidence.
YASU MESSAGE FROM NANA I WILL BE WAITING AT 7:00 IN FRONT OF ALTA IN SHINJUKU.
NANA
Hey, Hachi.
It is a little far, but that is the safest VIP seat.
I wonder if the baby in your belly can hear me singing, too.
Good morning, everyone!
It is Friday, October 26th.
Time for Music J.
The first video clip today is of the new Trapnest single,
Shadow of Love.
I want to wear the same dress as Reira's!
Huh?
You know, the wedding dress she wears in the promo video!
It is so beautiful!
I totally want to wear it!
Can they make another of the same?
We already ordered a dress.
You cannot change it now.
You will make the dressmaker cry.
But I want to wear it.
Then I will change twice during the reception.
That is too many times.
Besides, it is not the dress that is pretty.
It is Reira.
It would not look good on you.
Give it up.
I knew it!
You are involved with Reira!
No I am not!
And what do you mean I knew it?
Oh, Myu!
Good morning!
Calcium?
Can I have some?
Hey, Nobu.
Will you stop calling me Myu?
The name's not Myu.
It is Miu.
But it is too hard to pronounce.
Why not?
It is a cute nickname.
Everyone says so, and no one pronounces my name properly.
Though I really like my name.
No one does?
Then I will be the only one to call you Miu.
Are you off today?
Nope, we will be on a music show tonight,
so we have got a rehearsal in the afternoon.
You are really busy, huh?
It is already been one month since we moved into the dorm
and Nobu is getting cozy with the girl next door.
There was no point in us changing rooms!
I would have preferred to have him fool around with Yuri.
Why do people easily drift from one relationship to the next?
Until recently all he would say was,
Hachi, Hachi, Hachi, Hachi.
They are all such fools.
Hachi included.
But it would be too cruel to force Nobu into a relationship
that has no future.
I have no right to do that.
Hey, this is not good.
I am having... trouble breathing...
Good morning.
You going somewhere?
Like, to have your hair cut?
THERE IS NOTHING TO CUT
THERE IS NOTHING TO CUT
No, I have a meeting with Mr. Kawano,
No, I have a meeting with Mr. Kawano,
so I will be leaving ahead of you.
You are looking pale.
Are you feeling okay?
I am perfectly fine.
I cannot keep Yasu in unrequited love limbo.
On top of that,
why did I unwittingly move in next door to him?
That is pretty cruel.
One reason I did not want to get back with Ren is because
I was feeling Yasu's extraordinary love for me.
But in the end, I got swept away.
I am just one of the fools.
I will breathe into this just to be safe.
After all, I have got important work to do today.
I have managed to keep on living even when Ren was not around,
but without Yasu, I would probably fall apart.
I have got to end it.
The next time I see Ren, I will not get swept away.
It is been a while
since we performed live for a music show on TV!
I am sure the fans are looking forward to it.
I bet the ratings are going to be great!
I am sure of it.
They are throwing us in the pit together.
But even if they pick a fight, I am not going to fight back.
- What are you talking about?
- Here, say Aaah...
HERE, SAY AAAH - What are you talking about?
- Here, say Aaah...
HERE, SAY AAAH - Do not resort to violence, Takumi. - Aaah...
- Do not resort to violence, Takumi. - Aaah...
AAAH - Do not resort to violence, Takumi. - Aaah...
BLAST will be performing, too!
Hey, Hachi.
I always thought life was about standing your ground,
no matter how strong the current is.
But going with the flow is not such a foolish thing after all.
As long as you are moving forward.
Will you hold me now?
Hold me now?
My frozen heart
Kiss my lips and maybe you can
take me to your world for now
I cannot be alone right now
Will you hold me now?
Hold me now?
My frozen heart
I am lost in a deep winter sleep
I cannot seem to find my way out alone
Can you wake me
